channel.title: CVE Feed for Infinispan -- infinispan
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Infinispan -- infinispan

item.title: CVE-2017-15089|2024-08-05T19:50:14.965Z -- infinispan -- infinispan
item.description: It was found that the Hotrod client in Infinispan before 9.2.0.CR1 would unsafely read deserialized data on information from the cache. An authenticated attacker could inject a malicious object into the data cache and attain deserialization on the client, and possibly conduct further attacks.
